thread.title: Hickling

author: Hickling
title: Hickling
text: We have now had 2 different house sitters on 2 occasions. It's allowed us to relax and enjoy our Holidays knowing our small holding of animals are being looked after as we would look after them ourselves. Both sitters were exceptional, and we liked them straight away. It is very reassuring that there is an opportunity to rate and review. Trusted house sitters is a fantastic medium for bringing together people for want experiences and people who need peace of mind. Georgie & peter.
